function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of viruses like Zika and chikungunya across 73 countries and leading to public health emergencies","Impact":"Increased risk of a pandemic, mass infections, and public health emergencies","Mitigation":"International cooperation on disease surveillance, vector control, and public health response","Technologies":"Advanced disease surveillance systems, vector control technologies, and public health emergency response systems","People":"Global population, public health organizations, and government authorities","Owner":"Public health organizations, government authorities"},{"Description":"Spread of invasive mosquito species competent for arbovirus transmission, including Zika and chikungunya","Impact":"Increased risk of arbovirus transmission and outbreaks in new regions","Mitigation":"Enhanced mosquito surveillance, vector control measures, and research on invasive species management","Technologies":"Mosquito surveillance technologies, genetic modification of mosquitoes, and targeted vector control methods","People":"Public health organizations, research institutions, and government authorities","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Territorial expansion of Aedes spp. incriminated as vectors for arboviruses and parasitic nematodes","Impact":"Potential spread of arboviruses and parasitic nematodes to new regions","Mitigation":"Enhanced surveillance for Aedes spp., vector control, and public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Advanced mosquito surveillance systems, genetic analysis of mosquito populations, and public communication platforms","People":"Public health organizations, local communities, and government authorities","Owner":"Public health organizations, government authorities"}]}
